dict.string:
Stops auto slide to passcode screen on failed Touch ID attempts.
NOTE: Only tested with "Rest Finger to Open" option enabled at Settings-> Acesssibility -> Home Button
Minor known issues... (if you find more, please post them in the comments)
* After resprings, the LS will show instead of the passcode screen. * When on the passcode screen, if button entries are deleted then the next Touch ID attempt may take two scans/presses to unlock instead of one.
[v.1] Tested with an iPad mini 4 on 10.2. Made as a request via r/jailbreak. (4-6-17)
â˜žPayPal: goin730@gmail.com
LS - No Auto Slide To Passcode Screen On Failed Touch ID Attempt
